heading: Limitations on continuation of close corporation status.

content.text: A close corporation continues to be such and to be subject to this subchapter until:

content.content: It files with the Secretary of State a certificate of amendment deleting from its certificate of incorporation the provisions required or permitted by ยง 342 of this title to be stated in the certificate of incorporation to qualify it as a close corporation; or

Any 1 of the provisions or conditions required or permitted by ยง 342 of this title to be stated in a certificate of incorporation to qualify a corporation as a close corporation has in fact been breached and neither the corporation nor any of its stockholders takes the steps required by ยง 348 of this title to prevent such loss of status or to remedy such breach.
